sentences.sContent: The shadow on this sundial showed the time to the minute precisely!
sentences.sContent_eng: The shadow on this sundial showed the time to the minute precisely!
sentences.sCn: 由这个日晷的阴影显示出来的时间，精确到了分钟。

sentences.sContent: The invention and use of the gnomon-and-ruler, sundial, clepsydra and other time-measuring machines is evidence of Chinese wisdom.
sentences.sContent_eng: The invention and use of the gnomon-and-ruler, sundial, clepsydra and other time-measuring machines is evidence of Chinese wisdom.
sentences.sCn: 圭表、日晷、漏刻等计时仪器的发明和应用，证明中华民族是个充满智慧的民族。

synos.tran: 日晷，[天]日规；羽扇豆（产于美国东部）

trans.tranOther: an object used in the past for telling the time. The shadow of a pointed piece of metal shows the time and moves round as the sun moves.
